message: Hum-Drum's basement has a couch and a table, which we use for informal meetings. We all gather down there.
Mr. Haga seems to realize something's going on, because he heads right back upstairs after showing us down.
Koujaku, Clear, Mink, and I sit on the couch.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Right, let's pick up where we left off. What happened to Ms. Tae? I couldn't get ahold of her, and considering what happened to you and all..."

name: 紅雀
message: "I know she hates Coils. I'm hoping that's all it is, but if it's not..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah..."
As I trail off, Koujaku flashes a knowing frown.

name: 紅雀
message: "Something happened, didn't it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...She was kidnapped."

name: 紅雀
message: "By who?!"

name: ミンク
message: "Morphine."
Koujaku snorts at this.

name: 紅雀
message: "What? You're a funny guy. Morphine? You gonna tell me they disappeared her, too? She ain't got nothing to do with Rib."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Koujaku. I saw it with my own eyes. I saw Morphine's tag."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Seriously?"
I tell him about how I arrived home to find Granny gone, and about Mink, and about those Morphine―Dry Juice―members.
I know mentioning that Mink kidnapped me would just add fuel to the fire, so I gloss over the details.
Koujaku listens intently. Once I've finished, he lets out a small sigh and leans back into the couch.

name: 紅雀
message: "I still can't believe it. You sure those Morphine tags weren't just this asshole fucking with you?"
Koujaku glares at Mink.

name: 紅雀
message: "This guy's a fucking criminal."

name: ミンク
message: "Believe whatever you want."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah? Where do you get off telling us shit?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Whatever you're planning, leave us the fuck out of it."

name: ミンク
message: "That's up to him. Not you."
Mink points to me with his pipe.

name: ミンク
message: "He accepted my conditions in exchange for my help finding his grandmother. The deal's between him and me."

name: 紅雀
message: "First I've heard of it. And what the hell are these conditions?"

name: ミンク
message: "I don't have to tell you that. I will say I have a lead on his grandmother's location."

name: ミンク
message: "My men tracked down the guys who kidnapped her. If you don't believe me, that's your problem."
Koujaku turns to me. His eyes are asking, "What are you gonna do?"
I...<K> already know the answer.
I totally understand Koujaku's suspicions. It's not like I trust Mink either.
But Mink is the only one with a clue where Granny might be. I don't have a choice.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Koujaku, please. I just want to save Granny. I don't know what else to do."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Please help."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba..."
Gradually, the anger fades from Koujaku's face, though there's still a fire in his eyes.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Fine. If you're that intent on doing this, I'll help. I'll just have to take your word this guy's on the level."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks."

name: 紅雀
message: "No problem. It's for you."
Koujaku shoots Mink another glare.
Mink blows out a puff of white smoke, then glances over at the stairs.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"
At first, I think he's just trying to rile Koujaku up by ignoring him, but no. His eyes are sharp, like a hawk's.
Is something there?

name: ミンク
message: "Hey."
Mink gestures at the cockatoo with his chin.
It flies through the door to the stairs.
There's some clattering, then the bird returns with something in its talons.

name: 紅雀
message: "What the hell is that?"

name: クリア
message: "Some kind of block?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's..."
The bird is holding a cube.
Wait, I've seen this thing before.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz. It's him again."

name: ミンク
message: "Someone needs to be taught some manners."

name: 紅雀
message: "Him again? Is eavesdropping his hobby or something?"

name: クリア
message: "Oh, so that's what I heard at the door earlier."

name: ミンク
message: "You know the guy this belongs to?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess you could say that."

name: ミンク
message: "A guy who knows the value of intel. Could be useful."
Mink grabs me by the arm and whispers into my ear:

name: ミンク
message: "Get him to join us."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: ミンク
message: "Persuade him. Like you do on the phone at work."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you even want with him?!"

name: ミンク
message: "We could use someone clever. The more cards we have, the better."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, what are you whispering about over there?!"
Mink lets me go. I sit back.
I'm pretty sure Mink was talking about my voice.
But getting Noiz on our side? Easier said than done.
Will I really be able to "persuade" him, like I do with customers?
I face the cube the cockatoo is holding and take a deep breath.
I'm not crazy about the idea. I don't know Noiz or Mink very well.
But Granny's in danger. I have to give it a shot.
Focusing―how does it feel when I speak to customers on the phone?―I make my voice soft and low.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Noiz. That's you, right? Can you hear me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "So... I'm kind of in trouble."

name: 蒼葉
message: "To be totally honest, things might be pretty hard with just the four of us. So... do you think you could lend me a hand? When everything's over..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'll do whatever you want."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Please. I could really use your help."
